review_data.title: Tapas
review_data.content: El mejor restaurante de todo zurich , los camareros fueron muy amables y la comida era deliciosa. Nos encantó

review_data.title: Des tapas comme on les aime
review_data.content: Succulents tapas faits maison avec service rapide et très agréable. Encore meilleurs qu'à Barcelone!

review_data.title: Bar de tapas auténtico
review_data.content: La comida excelente y los precios razonables. Ideal para quitarse el antojo de croquetas, bravas y ensaladilla. Volveremos pronto.

review_data.title: Best tapas in town
review_data.content: We came without reservation early in the evening, and we were lucky. There was a free table for 2. And that was not the only luck... the tapas were super. We have had a lovely evening with delicious food. The 2 guys are very nice...More

review_data.title: How to feel in Spain, while in Zürich
review_data.content: The menu is a wonderful synergy of ingredients - very varied and with an outstanding quality. Most of the products are imported from Spain. I am from Sevilla, and thanks to Manu and Christian I had the pleasure to have a culinary trip back to...More

review_data.title: Expexted more

review_data.title: Sehr zu empfehlen!

review_data.title: Yummy food and wine
review_data.content: Been here yesterday for a friend's birthday. The food and wine were really good and the staff are very helpful. Recommended

review_data.title: authentische Küche und äusserst freundliche Bedienung

review_data.title: Delicious tapas in a cozy atmosphere
review_data.content: Great location, close to the tram station Lochergut. The restaurant with a "two man show" ( one cook behind the kitchen bar & one waiter ), true spanish guys, who transmit the feeling sitting in a tapas bar in La Rambla. The food was extraordinary...More

review_data.title: Easy tapas
review_data.content: Very informal and relaxed tapas place with a good food and friendly service, been there several times and definitely recommend it for an easy get together with friends.

review_data.title: My favorite tapas restaurant in Zürich by far!!!
review_data.content: Food is absolutely great, good atmosphere, very nice service and fair price for Zürich !! I love this place!!

review_data.title: Good quality food nice wines and Spanish feeling
review_data.content: This was our first time out here nice place small but homey feeling and more important good food with very friendly staff. We will be back

review_data.title: OK, but.....
review_data.content: Small restaurant, nice Service, little choice of Tapas and wine by the glass. The tables in and outside are too tight nothing for people with claustrophobia and no privacy.

review_data.title: Better than tapas in Spain
review_data.content: We loved it. A bit crowded and small but we liked sitting next to the road watching the people passing by. The selections of dishes were unique and wasn't even to be found in Spain. A good experience.

review_data.title: Tapas and friends
review_data.content: This restaurant stays always true to its name. In a warm and cosy atmosphere we enjoyed the chef’s selection of tapas. We were served with all the tasted of Spain and had spanish beer to savour between dishes.

review_data.title: Sehr fein

review_data.title: To avoid at all costs!

review_data.title: Very taste tapas!

review_data.title: small, but charming place with good tapas

review_data.title: Felt like Barcelona
review_data.content: I have been to Barcelona very often, and always loved the food and ambiance there. Tapas & Friends really reminded me of that. The food was amazing, the staff very nice. Definitely coming back!

review_data.title: Good but expensive

review_data.title: I feel like at home
review_data.content: I am from barcelona, and i should say that this is a wonderful place to eat. Food is amazing and croquetas are great. Taste the pimientos and solomillo! Nice staff! Enjoy your meal

review_data.title: Authentic nice tapas place

review_data.title: Friendly staff delicious food!
review_data.content: I was invited by a friend of mine, already frequent customer. We asked for the "meal for 2". Absolutely delicious! Staff is very friendly! To get there take the tram 2 or 3, perfect for a summer evening.

review_data.title: Spanje in Zürich

review_data.title: OK tapas, tiny portions, overpriced, nice decor
review_data.content: The tapas flavours were OK but te portions were tiny. For example the pan con tomate was two small portions of mini baguette.. The food is authentic. Overall, not great value for money.

review_data.title: Geheimtipp!

review_data.title: The real deal
review_data.content: Great place for tapas, arguably the best in Zürich. Staff is incredibly friendly. Food was delicious and authentic. Prices were totally fine for the quality of food and service. If you are a fan of tapas and or Catalonian wine, this will become your next...More

review_data.title: A place un Zurich with real Tapas

review_data.title: Zu empfehlen!

review_data.title: Spanish lessons included!

review_data.title: Fenomenal

review_data.title: Way overpriced

review_data.title: Simple and tasty
review_data.content: A new entry in Zurich city! Tapas & Friends opened recently in the very trendy neighbourhood of Kreis 3 in Zurich. It is great for lunch or for take away/delivery at your office. The tapas are great and much more tasty than a usual sandwich!
